bug.author: hachreak
bug.summary: skip button point to the wrong task id
bug.description:
Describe the bug I was trying to skip a task which have an id 18008865235058689 (url: http://127.0.0.1/?task_id=18008865235058689, but the click action run a request to cancel the wrong task id 18008865235058688. Also the Task ID: XXX on the bottom looks wrong. <denchmark-code>POST /api/tasks/18008865235058688/cancel HTTP/1.0" 501 </denchmark-code>
Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Linux Browser: chromium v73 , firefox v60.9 server: python 3.5.3
